price: 52. Bazali koloba: Eh mawa na biso! Nani asekwisi biso na esika oyo tozalaki kolala? Boye oyo nde elaka ya Ar-Rahmán(1) alakaki, mpe batindami balobaki bosóló.
arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰوَيۡلَنَا مَنۢ بَعَثَنَا مِن مَّرۡقَدِنَاۜۗ هَٰذَا مَا وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَصَدَقَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qālū yāwaylanā man baʿathanā min marqadinā hādhā mā waʿada al-raḥmānu waṣadaqa al-mur'salūna
